amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding in the bill by $1 billion for various projects. The increase would be offset by a reduction in the tax cut for taxpayers earning in excess of $1 million in calendar year 2007.

action.text: Mr. Hobson raised a point of order against the Visclosky amendment (A001). Mr. Hobson stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
